ygData.subject: Re: Bear Hide Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, The Bearhide Armor looks like kick-butt armor for low/medium level wizards.   Baobob will make me everything but the cloak.  Chanda keeps getting killed
ygData.messageBody:
Okay,

The Bearhide Armor looks like kick-butt armor for low/medium level wizards. Baobob will make me everything but the cloak. Chanda keeps getting killed before I talk to her, but I assume I'll run into
the same problem. How do I raise my faction with these guys so that they will make me all the pieces of armor? The say I need to help there family in the Karanas. I've talked to Mom, Pop, Jr, the
Gnoll, and Tiny but have recieved no leeds on helping them.

Thanks in Advance.
Malkin

P.S.
Thanks for fixing your E-Mails Bob
